task_description: 将平面插画风格的包子剖面图转换为Pixar 3D ICON风格

operation_params.style_reference: Pixar 3D cartoon style, Q-version cute design, high-gloss surface texture, dual light source (top + 45° front), pure white background
operation_params.additional_prompt: Convert this flat illustration of cross-section baozi (steamed bun) into Pixar 3D ICON style. Transform into 3D showing the cut surface with visible meat filling inside. Soft white dough texture with natural layers, juicy meat filling with ground meat and scallions. Show steam rising from the hot filling. Pure white background. 1024x1024px, commercial quality.

metadata.notes: HOO XIANG品牌包子剖面3D ICON转换
